content: row 2 then row 1 and 2 total of 25 row row 139a 151a repeat row 137a and 138a 15 row row 81 93 repeat row 5 to 17 rejoining row 94-118 repeat row 2 then row 1 and 2 total of 25 row break yarn leaving a 4 inch tail rejoin with the 14 sts you put aside to join yarn knit the first st then knit the second st row 119 131 repeat row 5 to 17 wrapping both the working yarn and the yarn end around the needle to form the st make sure you knit this as one st on the at this stage your scarf will have four sets of cable repeats worked following row with 3 longer stocking stitch sections separating them row 137b rs k2 p2 x 3 times k2 row 138b ws p2 k2 x 3 times p2 row 139b 151b repeat row 137b and 138b 15 row row 152 ws p2 k2 x 3 times p4 k2 p2 x 3 times you may wish to purl the first two sts of the second 14 sts using both the working yarn and yarn end to secure the yarn end if you do so remember to knit each st as one on the next row row 153 156 repeat row 1 and 2 4 row row 157 169 repeat row 5 to 17 row 170 173 repeat row 2 and then row 1 and 2 cast off in pattern finishing weave in ends and wear with a smile to ward away the chill for pattern support please visit my group on ravelry tikki love or email me at georgie@tikkiknits com you can find me on ravelry as tikki you can also find me at www tikkiknits com www facebook com/tikkiknits © georgie hallam 2009 all rights reserved pattern is for personal use only © georgie hallam 2014 all rights reserved
